title: Carrie Symonds’ Conservative Party Conference looks were an exercise in perfect contradictions
text:
Carrie Symonds is learning the First Girlfriend fashion ropes. And while it’s been a baptism of fire, at times, she’s proved to be a quick student.

At the Conservative Party Conference this week in Manchester, the 31-year-old environmentalist wore a trio of outfits that struck a diplomatic balance between accessible and appropriate.

Take the bright pink ruffled midi dress from H&M-owned brand & Other Stories, which she wore on Wednesday to watch Boris Johnson’s keynote speech. The high neckline and below-the-knee hem were modest, yet the ruffles were on-trend and the bright colour fun, a reminder that she’s young and fresh-thinking, not stuffy.
description: Carrie Symonds is learning the First Girlfriend fashion ropes.
